page.title: 04Education.
page.content: There are no schools in the actual area.The few children who live in Maidencombe go to Stokeinteignhead or Watcombe Primary Schools.The children from the St. Marychurch end may go to St. Marychurch Church of England School or Priory Roman Catholic School .Some children pay to go to private school.There are five secondary schools that the children may attend, Cuthbert Mayne,Westlands,Audley Park, Boys Grammer or Girls Grammer Schools. When the children are older they may go on to University or Technical College.
